title: Teslaâ€™s 'full self-driving' faces intensifying safety scrutiny
description: Tech analyst William Stein tested Tesla's 'Full Self-Driving' system three times and reported unsafe maneuvers, raising concerns about its safety. Federal regulators are scrutinizing Tesla's autonomous driving system after multiple crashes. Skepticism grows over Tesla's promise of a driverless fleet by next year.
